hits.name: Vegetable Oil - 2L
hits.description:
Frying and cooking with your well-known Devon King’s cooking oil has given you quality assurance over the years. It is now fresher than ever before as it is produced in a world class, CODEX-certified manufacturing environment and it no longer stays on high seas for over 6 months. What’s more, the pack range makes your brand affordable at every price point.
Affordability
You can cook for as low as 50 Naira ($0.3) and still conveniently cook for 6 people with just one pack of Devon King’s Oil. Whatever your budget is, King’s has a quality option for you. King’s delivers right pack for your cooking at the right value.
Freshness Guaranteed
Now you can buy vegetable oil and be absolutely sure of the freshness. It is locally made to the best manufacturing standards. The pillow pack quality is guaranteed and would not burst unlike other sachets.
Tamper-Evident
Devon King’s unique double seal provides ultimate tamper evidence to guarantee you its utmost quality. With this you’re sure of the quality product in every pack purchased. Its worth looking out for before every purchase.

lvl3: Drinks & Groceries > Food > Cooking Ingredients > Cooking Oils

hits.name: Grinder/Blender - S-742
hits.description:
A most useful appliance;  3 - in - 1 Grinder and Blender is a multi-functional kitchen buddy that easily mixes and crushes ice in cocktails, emulsifies mixtures, make purees, and blend mixtures of powders and granules together. Blend your pepper, melon, fruits to make smoothies, make cocktails, make juice amongst other things. If you are a coffee lover, grind coffee seeds, nuts, dried fruits and spices with ease.
This blender can be used both in residential and commercial kitchens. Featuring razor sharp stainless steel blades, this blender houses an electric motor and a small output shaft that penetrates the upper housing and meshes with the blade assembly. It has an inner cap for adding ingredients while blending; you will always get your desired blend.
Its circuit breaker prevents motor burnout from overloading. It has a very long life span because all the parts - from the steel cutting blades to the built-in circuit breaker are made of quality materials.

Function: Blends & Grind
Very effective 3 in 1 grinder
Durable
Built-in Circuit Breaker
Long lasting

lvl2: Home and Kitchen > Small Appliances  > Mixers, Blenders and Juicers
